about_the_game:
"Smith and Dungeon" is a hack-and-slash roguelite game, where you play as a blacksmith exploring dungeons, battling monsters, collecting materials, and crafting powerful weapons!

Story

The Kingdom announced a grand reward for anyone who could craft a powerful weapon worthy of equipping the hero and their companions on their mission to defeat the Demon King. Only weapons approved by the king would be rewarded.

Upon hearing this, a young blacksmith, dreaming of fame and fortune, resolved to create the ultimate weapon.

"I want to craft weapons capable of defeating the Demon King with my own hands!"

To achieve this, he set out to explore dangerous dungeons under the Demon King's control, searching for rare materials to forge a weapon so powerful that it would prove its worth to the king.

Thus, his perilous journey into the dungeons began!

Craft a Variety of Weapons and Armor Using Gathered Materials!

Harness rare materials collected in dungeons to showcase your skills as a blacksmith! Craft weapons like swords, spears, and bows, as well as armor, helmets, shields, and rings. Equip your crafted gear to enhance your character and prepare for epic adventures!

Dynamic Dungeons that Change Every Time You Play!

Experience the thrill of roguelite gameplay with dungeons that generate random layouts, monster spawns, and treasure chest locations every time you enter. No two runs are ever the same!

Recruit Adventurers from the Guild to Form a Party!

Visit the town guild to enlist warriors, archers, mages, and other adventurers with diverse abilities. Assemble a party of up to two companions to battle monsters and collect rare materials in the dungeon!

Enhance Abilities to Help Your Character Grow!

Develop your character by upgrading Abilities that boost parameters or unlock new crafting skills. Strengthen your character and master the art of crafting weapons and armor!

Change the Look of Your Character with Equipped Gear!

Equipping weapons and armor changes the look of your character, allowing for full customization. Create your unique hero for every adventure!
